title: Question-Based Online Game Learning for Enhancing Information Literacy in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy (Smartphone Proficiency) and Awareness of Introductory University-Level Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: A blended learning design combining asynchronous game activities and real-time feedback sessions conducted in a smartphone-centric environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage framework (exploration-analysis-synthesis) to systematically expand research questions with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can generate at least five interconnected sub-questions on a given topic and explain the cyclical nature of information seeking
Learners demonstrate the ability to critically judge the credibility and suitability of information sources by achieving 80+ points in an in-game simulation assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
